Mirage: - Bots can now choose to play {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lady Geist|Size=20}} Lady Geist, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Mirage|Size=20}} Mirage, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Shiv|Size=20}} Shiv, and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden
Dynamo: - Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Viscous|Size=20}} Viscous icon to look more different from {{HeroIcon|Hero=Dynamo|Size=20}} Dynamo
- Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Dynamo|Size=20}} Dynamo not playing an animation during the cast delay on {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20}} Singularity
Viscous: - Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Viscous|Size=20}} Viscous icon to look more different from {{HeroIcon|Hero=Dynamo|Size=20}} Dynamo
- {{HeroIcon|Hero=Viscous|Size=20}} Viscous {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch will now show a red preview for when the punch is out of range but within 2x of the cast range
- Updated wall bounce effects for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Viscous|Size=20}} Viscous in ball form
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=The Cube|Size=20}} The Cube cleanse is now part of the T2
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch enemy warning time increased from 0.35s to 0.45s
- Can now use down dash during {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20}} Goo Ball
- Fixed {{ItemIcon|Item=Phantom Strike|Size=20}} Phantom Strike not positioning you correctly when using it with your {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20}} Goo Ball
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Splatter|Size=20}} Splatter post cast delay reduced from 0.5s to 0.2s
Wraith: - Fixed various projectiles going through bosses ({{HeroIcon|Hero=Wraith|Size=20}} Wraith cards, Geist bombs, etc)
Abrams: - {{HeroIcon|Hero=Abrams|Size=20}} Abrams now has a new custom heavy melee animation
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience reduced from 16% to 15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience T3 reduced from 9% to 8%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Siphon Life|Size=20}} Siphon Life spirit scaling increased from 0.2 to 0.3
- Fixed Cases where {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge was unexpectedly 'slamming' in to walls and stairs
Haze: - Fixed refresher not working properly with {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb
- Fixed some items that didn't proc before: {{ItemIcon|Item=Tesla Bullets|Size=20}} Tesla Bullets, {{ItemIcon|Item=Lucky Shot|Size=20}} Lucky Shot, {{ItemIcon|Item=Mystic Shot|Size=20}} Mystic Shot
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance now more accurately shows who it is shooting
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance sometimes not obeying line of sight accurately
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance bullets are now affected by {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Time Wall|Size=20}} Time Wall
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance evasion reduced from 50% to 25%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance fire rate reduced from 25% to 15%
Kelvin: - Fixed a bug where {{HeroIcon|Hero=Kelvin|Size=20}} Kelvin desperation VO for {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path were flipped
- Bullet damage growth reduced from 1.2 to 0.9
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam movement slow reduced from 70% to 50%
- Moving through breakables while on {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path now destroys them
Shiv: - Turned off a {{HeroIcon|Hero=Shiv|Size=20}} Shiv line where he referenced slowing down enemies when he wasn't actually doing so

- Bots can now choose to play {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lady Geist|Size=20}} Lady Geist, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Mirage|Size=20}} Mirage, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Shiv|Size=20}} Shiv, and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20}} Slice and Dice T2 reduced from +85 to +75
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20}} Killing Blow Rage buildup per spirit damage reduced from 0.02 to 0.013
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20}} Killing Blow Rage drain rate increased from 0.3 to 0.35
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20}} Killing Blow Full Rage Bonus Damage reduced from 20% to 15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20}} Killing Blow T2 increased from 5% to 10%
Bebop: - Removed reason 31 of why {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lash|Size=20}} Lash is better than {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop and replaced it with reason 26 of why {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lash|Size=20}} Lash is better than {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop (fixed a bug with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lash|Size=20}} Lash's hero select lines)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam duration spirit scaling reduced from 0.08 to 0.06
Lash: - Removed reason 31 of why {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lash|Size=20}} Lash is better than {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop and replaced it with reason 26 of why {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lash|Size=20}} Lash is better than {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop (fixed a bug with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lash|Size=20}} Lash's hero select lines)
Grey Talon: - Replaced a {{HeroIcon|Hero=Grey Talon|Size=20}} Grey Talon select line to make his intentions more clear
- Arrow cycle time reduced from 0.4s to 0.45s (overall dps unchanged)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Rain of Arrows|Size=20}} Rain of Arrows can be alternate-casted to remain near the ground
- Fixed air dash during {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Rain of Arrows|Size=20}} Rain of Arrows going half the distance
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Guided Owl|Size=20}} Guided Owl bonus spirit on death now has a 3s buffer window
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Guided Owl|Size=20}} Guided Owl: very slight turn rate improvements
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Guided Owl|Size=20}} Guided Owl radius increased from 12m to 13m
Infernus: - {{HeroIcon|Hero=Infernus|Size=20}} Infernus will no longer appear in every bot match
Lady Geist: - Bots can now choose to play {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lady Geist|Size=20}} Lady Geist, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Mirage|Size=20}} Mirage, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Shiv|Size=20}} Shiv, and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Life Drain|Size=20}} Life Drain cooldown reduced from 42s to 30s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Malice|Size=20}} Malice T1 improved from -2.75s Cooldown to -3s
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Life Drain|Size=20}} Life Drain not healing extra based on amplifications (like Soul Shredder and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Malice|Size=20}} Malice stacks)
Warden: - Bots can now choose to play {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lady Geist|Size=20}} Lady Geist, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Mirage|Size=20}} Mirage, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Shiv|Size=20}} Shiv, and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20}} Binding Word escape range and escape time increased by 15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20}} Last Stand spirit scaling increased from 0.9 to 1.2
Ivy: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stone Form|Size=20}} Stone Form now works against airborne targets
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kudzu Bomb|Size=20}} Kudzu Bomb T3 now also grants +2m Radius
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kudzu Bomb|Size=20}} Kudzu Bomb spirit power scaling increased from 0.6 to 0.7
- Fixed clicking noise when flying while disarmed
- Fixed being able to {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stone Form|Size=20}} Stone Form during the Take {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight animation to circumvent the vulnerable cast period
McGinnis: - Fixed looking up circumventing the min range on Wall and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage
- Can now cast parry to cancel your ult
- Fixed various issues with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20}} Spectral Wall indoors and near walls spawning the wrong number of segments
Mo & Krill: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20}} Combo damage spirit scaling increased from 0.8 to 1.1
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20}} Combo kill trigger now has a 3s buffer window to get credit
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sand Blast|Size=20}} Sand Blast T1 reduced from +1.5s to +1s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sand Blast|Size=20}} Sand Blast range increased from 30m to 35m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Burrow|Size=20}} Burrow base speed increased from 3 to 4
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Burrow|Size=20}} Burrow T3 speed reduced from +3 to +2
Paradox: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability={{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade T3 now also grants +2% Damage Amp
- Fixed being unable to be damaged by multiple {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Time Wall|Size=20}} Time Walls
Pocket: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Affliction|Size=20}} Affliction no longer goes through walls, now respects line of sight
Seven: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge stun duration reduced from 1.1 to 0.9
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge T3 reduced from 1.1 to 0.9
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge radius reduced from 6m to 5m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge can now be alternate-casted on self (does not stun you)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge now respects line of sight
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Lightning Ball|Size=20}} Lightning Ball T3 now also gives +1m Radius
Vindicta: - Gun cycle time increased from 0.19s to 0.22s (same overall dps)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake: distance enemies are allowed to move increased from 6m to 8m
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight ending if you touch the ground
- Low HP indication now also shows up while unscoped
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate Base damage reduced from 160 to 140
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate zoom level reduced a little bit
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight duration spirit scaling reduced from 0.2 to 0.15
Yamato: - Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.5 to 0.45
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20}} Crimson Slash fire rate slow reduced from 30% to 20%
- Fixed various issues with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20}} Flying Strike pathing
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation duration reduced from 5s to 4.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation T3 duration increased from +1.5s to +2s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation no longer provides unlimited ammo

Quicksilver Reload: - Fixed {{ItemIcon|Item=Quicksilver Reload|Size=20}} Quicksilver Reload bonus damage not working correctly with things like {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20}} Scorn and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flog|Size=20}} Flog
- No longer triggers if your ammo is at max value already
Ricochet: - Fixed {{ItemIcon|Item=Ricochet|Size=20}} Ricochet not respecting LOS when picking the targets
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from 12% to 10%
- Fixed {{ItemIcon|Item=Ricochet|Size=20}} Ricochet'd bullets not returning the right amount of damage
Unstoppable: - Updated {{ItemIcon|Item=Unstoppable|Size=20}} Unstoppable effects to be clearer at cast time
- Can no longer be cast during channels
Warp Stone: - Casting while on the ground will no longer stop the player in place, will try to move forward along the ground instead
- Fixed cases of {{ItemIcon|Item=Warp Stone|Size=20}} Warp Stone getting caught on geometry
Fire Rate: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate slows now stack diminishingly
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Headshot Booster|Size=20}} Headshot Booster: {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from +5% to +4%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Kinetic Dash|Size=20}} Kinetic Dash: {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from 25% to 20%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Kinetic Dash|Size=20}} Kinetic Dash: {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate max duration reduced from 8s to 7s
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Escalating Resilience|Size=20}} Escalating Resilience: {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from 14% to 12%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Headhunter|Size=20}} Headhunter: Now grants +5% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Ricochet|Size=20}} Ricochet: {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from 12% to 10%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Combat Barrier|Size=20}} Combat Barrier: {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate while shielded reduced from 8% to 6%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Return Fire|Size=20}} Return Fire: No longer grants +7% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Veil Walker|Size=20}} Veil Walker: No longer grants +20% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Withering Whip|Size=20}} Withering Whip: No longer grants +8% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Withering Whip|Size=20}} Withering Whip: {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate slow increased from 40% to 45%
Monster Rounds: - Bullet Resist vs NPCs reduced from 35% to 30%
High-Velocity Mag: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Pristine Emblem|Size=20}} Pristine Emblem: Now requires {{ItemIcon|Item=High-Velocity Mag|Size=20}} High-Velocity Mag
Headshot Booster: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from +5% to +4%
Kinetic Dash: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from 25% to 20%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate max duration reduced from 8s to 7s
Berserker: - Damage required per stack reduced from 110 to 100
Mystic Shot: - Damage spirit scaling increased from 0.6 to 0.8
- Fixed some items that didn't proc before: {{ItemIcon|Item=Tesla Bullets|Size=20}} Tesla Bullets, {{ItemIcon|Item=Lucky Shot|Size=20}} Lucky Shot, {{ItemIcon|Item=Mystic Shot|Size=20}} Mystic Shot
Melee Charge: - Impact now increases your ammo for that mag instead of reloading (so if your ammo is 2/8, it becomes 10/8). Reloads you instantly if in the middle of a reload.
Intensifying Magazine: - Max Weapon Damage reduced from 75% to 60%
Escalating Resilience: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from 14% to 12%
Headhunter: - Fixed not being affected by cooldown reduction
Sharpshooter: - Fixed falloff reduction not working properly
Frenzy: - Low HP Spirit Resist changed to Bullet Resist
Melee Lifesteal: - Heal vs non-heroes reduced from 40% to 30%
Restorative Locket: - No longer requires max stacks to restore a stamina point
Combat Barrier: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate while shielded reduced from 8% to 6%
- Weapon Damage while shielded reduced from 28% to 25%
Return Fire: - Bullet Damage Returned reduced from 70% to 60%
- No longer grants +7% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate
- Fixed {{ItemIcon|Item=Ricochet|Size=20}} Ricochet'd bullets not returning the right amount of damage
Bullet Armor: - Improved {{ItemIcon|Item=Bullet Armor|Size=20}} Bullet Armor: Bullet Resist increased from 45% to 50%
Veil Walker: - No longer grants +20% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate
Lifestrike: - Fixed proccing heal more than once when hitting multiple targets
Rebirth: - Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth: Increases base respawn rate by +15s
Spirit Strike: - No longer grants +0.8 {{ItemIcon|Item=Health Regen|Size=20}} Health Regen
Health Regen: - No longer grants +0.8 {{ItemIcon|Item=Health Regen|Size=20}} Health Regen
Mystic Reach: - Now provides 6% Bullet Resist instead of 6% Spirit Resist
Withering Whip: - No longer grants +8% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate slow increased from 40% to 45%
Decay: - Cast range scaling reduced from 0.2 to 0.16
Improved Reach: - Now provides 12% Bullet Resist instead of 12% Spirit Resist
Knockdown: - Now causes enemies to fall down faster
Torment Pulse: - Spirit Power damage scaling increased from 0.25 to 0.33
Rapid Recharge: - Faster Time Between Charges increased from +55% to +65%
- Cooldown Reduction For Charged Abilities increased from +25% to 30%
Magic Carpet: - Fixed it consuming stamina when jumping off
Escalating Exposure: - Fixed the bonus damage being reduced twice by resistance
Refresher: - Now has a 0.3s cast delay (like {{ItemIcon|Item=Refresher|Size=20}} Refresher)
Echo Shard: - Now has a 0.3s cast delay (like {{ItemIcon|Item=Refresher|Size=20}} Refresher)

Static Charge: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge stun duration reduced from 1.1 to 0.9
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge T3 reduced from 1.1 to 0.9
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge radius reduced from 6m to 5m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge can now be alternate-casted on self (does not stun you)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge now respects line of sight
Slice and Dice: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20}} Slice and Dice T2 reduced from +85 to +75
Stake: - distance enemies are allowed to move increased from 6m to 8m
Assassinate: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate Base damage reduced from 160 to 140
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate zoom level reduced a little bit
The Cube: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=The Cube|Size=20}} The Cube cleanse is now part of the T2
Goo Ball: - Can now use down dash during {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20}} Goo Ball
- Fixed {{ItemIcon|Item=Phantom Strike|Size=20}} Phantom Strike not positioning you correctly when using it with your {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20}} Goo Ball
Splatter: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Splatter|Size=20}} Splatter post cast delay reduced from 0.5s to 0.2s
Binding Word: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20}} Binding Word escape range and escape time increased by 15%
Last Stand: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20}} Last Stand spirit scaling increased from 0.9 to 1.2
Shadow Transformation: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation duration reduced from 5s to 4.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation T3 duration increased from +1.5s to +2s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation no longer provides unlimited ammo

General: hero_mirage.png

- Added an initial Anti-Cheat detection system. When a user is detected as cheating, during the game session the opponents will be given a choice between banning the user immediately and ending the match or turning the cheater into a frog for the rest of the game and then banning them afterwards. The system is set to conservative detection levels as we work on a v2 anti-cheat system that is more extensive. We will turn on the banning of users in a couple of days after the update is out. When a match is ended this way, the results will not count for other players.
two_buttons_abrams.png

- Added global quickcast support. You can now configure your abilities and/or items to be on quickcast mode globally. You can also customize each ability individually to be quickcast or not. This also supports grenade style abilities.
- Hero specific keybinds now say the ability name instead of ability 1-4
- Added Zipline hotkey that can be independently bound from space/jump
- Fixed per-hero keys not inheriting user-defined default keys properly
- Added keybind indicator for hero-specific binds showing which keys have been bound for that hero
- Added Custom Match play mode
- Private lobbies now have an option to turn on cheats
- Private lobbies now let you select the specific servers to use
- Private lobbies now have an option to make the match publicly visible or private to only the players
- Private lobbies now support post-game and replays properly
- Private lobbies now allow picking specific lanes (solo and dual lane colors are displayed)
- Added a cheat report option in-game and post-game
- Can now mute and report enemy players using ESC while in-game

- Updated the game access invite UI to make it clear when users have been accepted (in most cases we look into where a user said their friend wasn't accepted, the user was actually accepted but they never claimed the game on the Steam notifications side)
- Added voice indicators for when players are speaking in party and team chat (green for party, white for team)
- Updated Player Card and action menu when clicking on a player in the friend list or ESC menu
- Fixed Rich Presence for Steam and in-game friend lists
- Party Code is now hidden when you enable Streamer Mode
- Added Region indicator to the matches on the watch tab
- Fixed search by MatchID not working for games that are live
- Added Spectator Fog of War toggle (hotkeys available in settings)
- Added South Africa servers
- Added Italian localization
- Instead of showing the total number of favorites for each build, we now tag popular builds using a mix of both recent and historical usage so that newer builds are easier to find
- Builds that haven't been updated in 30 days now have a distinct visual
- General rendering performance improvements
- Shadow quality improvements for higher shadow settings
- Fixed issues with player outline rendering in FSR2
- Fixed regression with saturation volumes outline not showing up
- Displacement mapping no longer an official option and will likely be cut (it can be enabled with a ConVar after the game starts)
- Lighting improvements in map
- Picking up a powerup will now list all the stats they modify in the HUD instead of a generic name like 'Casting' or 'Gun'
- Spirit scaling is now always shown on the tooltips without needing to hold alt/tab
- Music and Sound effects will now pause during game pause
- Fixed Guardian trying to shoot people unsuccessfully behind cover
- Wall Jumps now use better animations to communicate directionality
- Fixed jumping between ziplines consuming stamina
- Fixed Magic Reverb not getting increased bonus damage from damage amps
- Improved preloading during queue time
- No longer play low ammo sounds when firing while sliding
- Fixed not being able to bind Reload to Mouse Wheel Up/Down
- Minimap line colors now match the color of the hero drawing them
- Fixed spectator keybinds not showing correctly
- Fixed Flex Slot unlock order not matching the usual order of unlocks
- Fixed imbue and active abilities dialog not responding to keybinds if your ability/item binds included a modifier key or were bound to the mouse wheel
- Updated bullet shield break effects
- Fixed Dash not always breaking breakables
- Breakables will now wait to spawn if a player is in the way
- Fixed min/max falloff range displaying incorrectly on Weapon Stats Tooltip
- Updated Rejuvenator buff effect
- Added citadel_give_gold cheat command
- Music bug fixes for replay and spectating
- Allow announcer lines for kill streaks and various hero lines to play while the player is in an active combat encounter
- Timing critical music and sfx will pause and resume in response to game pause
- Side lanes are now a little further apart from the middle lanes
- Added a First Blood bonus bounty for the first kill each player gets. Grants 150 bonus souls.
- Lane setup is now always 1-2-2-1
- Zipline Boost now starts on cooldown again
- Trooper damage reduction from Guardians reduced from 35% to 28% (they die a little faster to Guardians now)
- Trooper share radius reduced (from allied hero to allied hero 50m->40m, from orb to allied hero 40m->35m)
- Reverted recent creep sharing duplication changes (back to how it was over a week ago, we want to see if it's still an issue with the other changes in this patch)
- Some latency-related calculation improvements that help orbs be a little less deny favored
- Orbs now appear a little smaller to the enemy that is trying to deny them

- Added a Soul Generator (like the one in hero sandbox) in the respawn area. Starts spawning orbs at 3 minutes. Each orb is worth 10 souls when shot. (primary purpose for this is cases when you are very close to an item purchase)
- Rejuv bonus creep HP increased from 50% to 70%
- Rejuv bonus is no longer consumed for dead players, they have it on their next life now
- Troopers no longer give half bounty when base guardians are destroyed for that lane
- Killer to Assist bounty ratio reduced from 2.0 to 1.7 (slightly more to assists)
- Midgame respawn time increased a bit (reaches 50s at 20 min instead of 40s at 20 min)
- Teleporter delay reduced from 5s to 4s
- Guardians now deal 10% more damage to players
- Sinner's Sacrifice now grants a permanent golden statue bonus when it is killed
- Fixed Sinner's Sacrifice sharing bounty to nearby allies
- Added indicator on the hud to help track your passive cooldown items when they are 1s from ready (headshot Booster, Medic Bullets, etc)
- Boon count increased from 11 to 14 (added to 16/18/20k)
- Non-Health boon bonuses rescaled over the 14 levels (same total as before)
- Aggressive crouch spamming within a very narrow window will now cause you to very briefly move progressively slower
- Added Rejuv drop on a loop in the sandbox mode
- Added infinite ammo option to sandbox ("No Reload")
- Fixed dashing downwards not destroying breakables
- Silence now deselects your ability if you had it open when silenced
- Outer lanes at the middle of the map pushed further away from the inner lanes
- Added connection from canal near the urn platforms through the Radio Station and Apartment buildings
radio_station_connection.jpg
- Reworked interior corridors of Fish Market/Nursery to exit to the buildings sooner
- Added interior room partition from the Fish Market/Nursery to the Shops
- Moved rope to the Fish Market/Nursery rooftop to the back of the building
- Removed upper interior hallway from rope to the Fish Market/Nursery rooftops
- Moved truck from in front of archway with cosmic veil to the back of the Fish Market/Nursery
fish_market_changes.jpg
- Redesigned outer lane path (ziplines and trooper nodes) from Walker to Guardian on Amber Yellow and Sapphire Purple
amber_yellow_patch.png
amber_purple_patch.png
- Added interior passage beside Subway Entrance to the outer lanes
subway_entrance_connection.jpg
